biz.aduna.map.cluster
Class ClassificationTreeWriter

java.lang.Object
  biz.aduna.map.cluster.ClassificationTreeWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlConstants
public class ClassificationTreeWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlConstants

ClassificationTreeWriter serializes the contents of a hierarchy of Classifications containing Objects to an XML stream, using the SAX 1.0 API. Objects that are instances of DefaultObject have their properties serialized as well. The element and attribute names used in the serialization are defined in the XmlConstants interface.

Method Detail

writeTree

public void writeTree(Classification tree,
                      org.xml.sax.DocumentHandler handler)
               throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Sends SAX 1.0 events to the specified DocumentHandler that describe the contents of the specified Classification tree. The stream encodes a complete XML document, i.e. including startDocument and endDocument events.

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

writeTree

public void writeTree(Classification tree,
                      java.io.Writer writer)
               throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Writes the specified Classification tree to the specified Writer using the XML encoding of this class. The character stream contains a complete XML document. The specified Writer is not closed by this method.

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException
